thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1811
thread.title: SG

author: SG
title: SG
text: I made absolutely sure that I had unchecked all the extra services that come with a charge and double checked my total including taxes. However, when I went to purchase the tickets, I found the next page had included an extra charge for insurance that was added to my total and charged to my card automatically. I was furious because the new totally only shows up on the receipt when printed. This practice is deceitful and highly unethical.
